meta.title: Privacy Policy - CyberVPN
meta.description: CyberVPN's privacy policy covering data collection, no-log policy, GDPR rights, and data security practices.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.intro: CyberVPN collects minimal data necessary to provide our VPN service:

items.paymentInfo: Payment information (processed securely by third-party providers)
items.deviceInfo: Device and connection metadata (device type, operating system)
items.usageStats: Aggregate usage statistics (bandwidth usage, connection duration)

noLogPolicy.title: No-Log Policy
noLogPolicy.statement: CyberVPN operates a strict no-log policy. We do NOT collect, store, or log your online activity.

notLogged.browsing: No browsing history or website visits
notLogged.connections: No connection timestamps or session duration
notLogged.traffic: No traffic data or content inspection
notLogged.dns: No DNS queries or IP addresses

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We retain data only as long as necessary:

policies.accountData: Account data: retained while your account is active
policies.paymentRecords: Payment records: 7 years for legal compliance
policies.supportLogs: Support logs: 90 days after ticket closure
policies.deletedAccounts: Deleted account data: permanently erased within 30 days

gdprRights.title: Your GDPR Rights
gdprRights.intro: If you are in the European Economic Area (EEA), you have the following rights:

access.title: Right to Access
access.description: Request a copy of your personal data

erasure.title: Right to Erasure
erasure.description: Request deletion of your personal data

portability.title: Right to Data Portability
portability.description: Receive your data in a machine-readable format

objection.title: Right to Object
objection.description: Object to processing of your data

measures.encryption: End-to-end encryption for all VPN traffic
measures.regularAudits: Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: We work with trusted third-party providers:

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.intro: For privacy-related inquiries or to exercise your rights, contact us:

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date.
